2. Engine: Processing the Sequence data

This process uses R scripts

Note

Prerequisite

  • Sequences and required data already processed from the backend

  1. Extract pattern

    extract the 30bp segment (modular length) Apply biological rule (3’ CC == 5’ GG)

  2. Hamming distance

    tested in both R and Cpp (Cpp is faster ~40min for 200K GG based guides) In blocks of 25 guides to keep the process speedy

  3. Mergin the hamming distance

  4. Exact Conservation

  5. Relaxed Conservation (uses output of 3 to reduce list)

  6. Annotating

  7. Reverse Complement

  8. Add in ML predictions

  9. Add in Reporter results

  10. Off-target effects
